content:
# I successfully inserted 5 iron ore into the furnace, which should allow it to continue smelting and produce more iron plates.
# 
# The furnace is now processing the iron ore, and I can expect it to produce additional iron plates shortly.
# 
# I will wait again to see if the furnace completes the smelting process and produces more iron plates. I will check the inventory periodically for the output.

# Waiting for the smelting process to complete (with a maximum wait time).
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time of 30 seconds
    if inspect_inventory()[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 5:  # Checking if I have at least 5 iron plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an error if smelting didn't finish.
